subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The reigning horse of the year, Curlin won his fifth consecutive race Saturday, easily taking the Stephen Foster Handicap in his first race on North American soil in more than seven months.
snippet: The reigning horse of the year, Curlin won his fifth consecutive race Saturday, easily taking the Stephen Foster Handicap in his first race on North American soil in more than seven months.
